subject: Re: Updating our clinical online
preview: Hi Sarah, Apologies for the delay. We have now made the TB updates on all 3 forms. I noted your country option and changed them to checkboxes so that the applicant can select multiple ones. Good call

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Apologies for the delay. We have now made the TB updates on all 3 forms. I noted your country option and changed them to checkboxes so that the applicant can select multiple ones. Good call!

Regarding the emails, these are set up to send to your email address. Please check the spam folder. Perhaps they are headed there. Try to use a real name and email address as the system also has spam filters. If you put random characters, the emails may not land in your inbox.

HI Heath Sorry for all the emails. A couple of additional items to my email below (from Tuesday this week and also the previous week).
  • I have updated the graduate form and the HR screening form
  • I have tested the forms, but it doesn't appear the completed entry is automatically sent to my email address
  • I tested the other form (clinical candidates) and that still gets sent to me
  • AS per my email from last week, I need an additional section to capture Tuberculosis. I thought I could try and create something because I haven't heard back. I used the bulk 'county' upload. That seemed to work and is probably better than how I requested it below
It might be best to talk through it all because of the numerous emails. I will need to send the graduate links out by next Wednesday at the latest. So - hoping we can chat before then (I am not in the office tomorrow or Monday) Thanks Sarah

Hi Heath

Could I check if you saw my email last Tuesday. I had one more change that would need to be made on all 3 links (as per below). I was hoping to launch the new forms at the end of this week if possible, but not a deal breaker if it can't be done this week.

Regards

Sarah

Hi Heath

I have one more change to make to the main form (which would need to be replicated on all 3 links)

Under the immunisation section, could we please create a new field under a heading Tuberculosis Assessment that allows people to answer questions as per the screenshot below. This image comes from our declaration page and I completely missed it in my previous communication to you.

They only need to list a country if they have stayed there for more than 2 weeks so I'm think we create an 'add row' function if they need to list multiple countries

Also - if they answer yes to "have you ever had TB screening" then they have the option to upload the results (doesn't need to be mandatory because I'd still want them to complete the form even if they can't find the screening result to upload)



Thank you

Sarah Taggart

Human Resources

Lakeview Private Hospital|17-19 Solent Circuit Norwest NSW 2153

Tel: 02 8624 5000|Direct: 02 8711 0511 | E: sarah.taggart@lakeviewprivate.com.au

http://www.lakeviewprivate.com.au/

This is fantastic Heath. Thank you . I am going to ask a couple of people to road test the new form just to ensure it makes sense to someone who doesn't have my 'recruitment' eyes on it, and will let you know if there are any final changes.

Thanks so much.

Hi Sarah, 

Yes sure, confirming we have made those changes for you. 

The new forms are here:
https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/support-services-form/
https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/graduate-form/

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
@heath please check it again if I did right.

https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/online-clinical-candidate-form/

1. I create a message after submitting the form to the Confirmation settings
"<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>From Wednesday 14 September, update the new online form link on the  <a href="https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/careers-and-volunteers/">click here to submit</a></strong></p>"

2. I create 2 same form name "Support Services Form" and "Graduate Form"
3. I update all changes from the doc. attached
4. instruction "ON page 1, delete the la" sorry I don't know where is that "la"

Thanks
@manuel can you please make these changes. Cheers

Hi Heath

Thank you. Those changes are great.

I have a few changes as per the enclosed document and once the page is complete, could we please do the following:


  1. From Wednesday 14 September, update the new online form link on the About Us / Careers Page / [Click here to submit] button to the new link (unless sit's just the same link but a new form of course)

  2. Could you please create 2 new links with exactly the same form but call one "Support Services" and the other one "Graduate Form" and then if those get sent to me I can customise in the backend for support each



Thank you

Sarah

Let us know if you have any changes?

@manuel can you please take care of this task. The current form is located here: https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/career-app-clinical/

Hi Sarah,

Yes sure, we can do this for you, we will clone the current form and make the changes. This way both can coexist for a period of time. We will be able to do this in your current care plan. I'll be in touch toward the end of the week.

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath


I hope you are well.


I would like to overhaul the online recruitment portal for clinical candidates and once we have done that one, I can update the support services one very easily.


I have tried to explain the changes in the attached document which I would appreciate you having a look at and letting me know if it makes sense. If so, could you let me know what resources you have and a timeframe to make the change. I recognize that once we change the form, I will have to archive the current database and new entries will not be able to concatenate with my previous version.


I am also looking to update the overall look and feel of our recruitment landing page but will work on this first and then address that next month.


I look forward to hearing from you


Regards


Sarah
